Cromartie Law — Rome, Georgia, Personal Injury Litigation Attorney

Cromartie Law is a personal injury lawyer located in Rome, Georgia. The practice specializes in a number of areas, including personal injury, workers' compensation and wrongful death. They can also handle medical malpractice, pharmacy malpractice and issues involving negligence in day cares and nursing homes.

Mr. Cromartie has over 25 years of experience in personal injury and insurance defense, the latter providing him insight into the decision making process of insurance companies. He also understands Georgia law with regard to:

  • Slip-and-fall injuries, property owner liability
  • Auto and motor vehicle accidents, including hit-and-run
  • Defective products

Georgia Workers' Compensation Law Firm

His high level of familiarity with the Georgia State Board of Workers' Compensation can allow him to handle the entire process from the initial application, and he represents workers in all types of occupations.

Straightforward Advice, Effective Representation

The firm offers straightforward and ethical legal advice and is prepared to handle both settlements and trials. Mr. Cromartie offers a free initial consultation. They are located next to the Floyd County Courthouse in downtown Rome, convenient to much of northwest Georgia and not that far from Atlanta.

He serves clients throughout the area, including Floyd and Chattooga counties. Call his office at 706-622-4853 local or 866-752-9643 toll free — or email him today to find out what he can do to get you the compensation you deserve.
